name: RL 1400 L 5 T
description: Heavy-duty diesel-powered lighting tower with 4 × 350W LED heads delivering 1,400W total output. Features 8m telescopic mast with electric vertical lift, 360° manual rotation, and 90° head tilt. Deep-Sea DSEL401 controller with comprehensive engine protection systems.

name: RS400LDT
description: Zero-emission solar lighting tower with 64,000 lumen output covering 1,600m² at 5 lux. Features 19.2 kWh lead-acid battery with 1.14 kWp solar panel, 32-hour autonomy, and 7.5m manual mast with 360° rotation and 70° tilt capability.

name: RS600LDT
description: Premium solar lighting tower with 96,000 lumen output covering 2,000m² at 5 lux. Features 24 kWh lead-acid battery with 1.52 kWp solar panel, 24-hour autonomy, and 7.5m manual mast. Highest light output in the solar line with advanced battery management.
